name: Kitty Pirate
description:
Created for the One Hour Game Jam 234: https://onehourgamejam.com/?page=jam&jam=234#

You are a mighty little kitty pirate, with a powerful cannon. Shoot the ships and collect LOOT. Left Mouse Click to move, Right Mouse Click to shoot cannon. The game is made by an Artist-Programmer team of 2. This is our first one hour gamejam!
